name: Kyriad Paris XIII - Italie Gobelins Hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I stayed at the Kyriad Italie Gobelins for 2 nights with my girlfriend in late March 07 and first things first - it is basic. The room is rather small (although perhaps this was due to the huge bed installed) and the shower/bathroom could be desribed as pokey. However everything was clean and comfortable and we had absolutely no complaints.
reviews.title: A Basic Base
